meta.description: A simple and affordable exhaust fan with an airflow of 170 m³/h, perfect for small tents and grow areas. Effectively removes heat, humidity, and stale air by exchanging it with the ambient environment.
disadvantages: Not as effective as an AC unit for large heat loads
Relies on ambient temperature for cooling
meta.notes: Essential for any small grow setup to prevent heat and humidity buildup without the cost of a full climate unit.
